message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our unique product to you. It is tailored to meet your specific needs and offers significant value. Considering its worth and the benefits it provides, we are offering it to you for $1500000. We believe this price reflects its exceptional quality and potential impact on your business.

Dear Alice, thank you for your offer. While I understand the value of the product, I'm not willing to pay $1500000. I'm willing to pay $1200000, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth and the market value. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Thank you for your response, Bob. After careful consideration, we would like to propose a revised price of $1400000 for the product. This still reflects its high value and potential benefits for your business, while remaining competitive within the market. We hope this proposal will be more suitable for your budget.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. While I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, I'm still not comfortable paying $1400000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $1250000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth and the market value. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Dear Bob, thank you for your latest offer. After further evaluation, we are willing to consider $1350000 as a fair price for the product. This still takes into account its value and potential impact on your business, while being more accommodating to your budget constraints. We hope this revised price will help us reach a mutually beneficial agreement.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. While I appreciate your willingness to compromise, I'm still not willing to pay $1350000. I'm willing to offer $1275000, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth and the market value. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Dear Bob, thank you for your continued engagement. After careful consideration, we are prepared to offer the product at $1300000. This price reflects the product's value and potential benefits for your business, while also being responsive to your budgetary concerns. We hope this revised price will facilitate a positive outcome for both parties.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. While I appreciate your willingness to compromise, I'm still not willing to pay $1300000. I'm willing to offer $1275000, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth and the market value. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Dear Bob, thank you for your latest offer. After thorough review, we are prepared to consider $1290000 as a fair price for the product. This price takes into account the product's value and potential benefits for your business, while also being responsive to your budgetary considerations. We hope this revised price will lead to a successful conclusion of the transaction.

Dear Alice, thank you for your revised offer. I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still not willing to pay $1290000. I'm willing to offer $1250000, which is the maximum I'm willing to spend. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's worth and the market value. If this offer is not accepted, I will consider purchasing the product from John for $1200000.
